-1.title: Franklin Christoph 31 "Omnis"
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Matt Armstrong, a brave man, going on a long and dangerous journey to find the Golden Fountain Pen of Zeus. Accompanied by Luke the Brave, a magical and mysterious golden retriever dog, he is facing many obstacles in his path such as financial ruins and online trolls. Will he find what he was looking for? Will he rise above and beat the nasty haters? Will Luke get a treat today? Tune in to find out! The Pen Habit!
imdb.title: The Pen Habit
plot: Matt Armstrong, a brave man, going on a long and dangerous journey to find the Golden Fountain Pen of Zeus. Accompanied by Luke the Brave, a magical and mysterious golden retriever dog, he is facing many obstacles in his path such as financial ruins and online trolls. Will he find what he was looking for? Will he rise above and beat the nasty haters? Will Luke get a treat today? Tune in to find out! _The Pen Habit_ (qv)!::Dror Zellner
